tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_location_data (
    location_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE geofences (
  geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL,
  radius DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR,
  event_date DATE,
  location_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES location_data(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES marketing_events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_date DATE,
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE geofences (
    geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    radius INT
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    geofence_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES marketing_campaigns(campaign_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (geofence_id) REFERENCES geofences(geofence_id)
);
